ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that I m able to fight the gnolls in SK, I have more money than usually. They sometimes will drop a couple PP and they also drop fine steel weapons that
ygData.messageBody:
Now that I'm able to fight the gnolls in SK, I have more money than usually.  
They sometimes will drop a couple PP and they also drop fine steel weapons
that sell from 4 to 6PP each.  So a couple hours there will give you some PP.
 Of course nothing like the PP you would need to afford some of the
outrageously expensive items I see going for auctions in the EC tunnel.  

Lena


In my original post I might not of made it clear I do not go around
inspecting others but I read about how others have allot of money and was
unsure how they did this. I do not like to twink my characters I think the
fun is in earning what you get not being given to you by others. So I was
just interested in how others made $ in EQ(i.e.. selling things, helping
higher level PC, etc...)  It has been nice to see others in the same
position thanks for  the responses
